INSIDERMeet the creators of MC:T1
遇见MC:T1的创作者

A mod that helps players learn the effects of diabetes
一个能让玩家理解糖尿病影响的模组

Kelsey Howard 凯尔茜·霍华德

What started as a way for a father and son to approach a life-changing diagnosis turned into a worldwide campaign for awareness and education. Prahlad and Josh Wulf, supported by magikcraft.io, have created a way to use the powers of Minecraft to teach people about living with type 1 diabetes. They did this with their Minecraft mod,MC:T1 . MC:T1 teaches players about the correlation between food, insulin, and type 1 diabetes by turning it into a something that players can experience themselves in Minecraft.
一开始，是父亲教会孩子面对病症的折磨；到后来，却是父亲带着孩子，改变了全世界人们对糖尿病的了解。在magikcraft.io的支持下，普拉拉德·沃夫和乔希·沃夫，创造了一种用Minecraft进行科普的方式，让人们了解1糖尿病。通过他们编写的mod——MC:T1，他们做到了。MC:T1将食物、胰岛素与1型糖尿病的关系在Minecraft中展现了出来，使玩家能真切体验患者们的感受。
Watch the video below to take a look behind the fantastic people and organizations behind MC:T1!
看看这个视频，来了解一下为MC:T1默默努力的那些人吧！


https://www.bilibili.com/video/av837562489
Information about type 1 diabetes is often dense and complicated, but by putting it within the framework of Minecraft, medical information becomes an intuitive part of the gameplay.
有关1型糖尿病的信息通常是极其复杂的，但是，在Minecraft的背景下，复杂的信息也变得直观易懂了。
Try it yourself at:https://www.mct1.io/ and check out Josh & Prahlad's platform Magikcraft which teaches you to code in Minecraft!http://magikcraft.io/
你可以在https://www.mct1.io/ 上亲自下载尝试，也可以看看Magikcraft——乔希和普拉拉德的编程教学平台——来在学习在Minecraft中编写程序！链接：http://magikcraft.io/
